product_name: ExOfficio Dryflylite Cap Sleeve Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Attractive styling and technical details make the women's ExOfficio Dryflylite Cap Sleeve Shirt a versatile choice for work, weekends and travel adventures to faraway lands. Dryflylite fabric has a soft feel and dries fast; when it's worn, your body heat acts like a wrinkle-releasing humidifier. Fabric wicks moisture out and away from the body while ventilation provides an extra breeze in all the right places. Fabric provides UPF 30 protection from harmful solar rays. Cape vent is lined with mesh for breathability and moisture dispersion. Dryflylite Cap Sleeve shirt has chest pockets. Regular cut is not too tight and not too loose; it's just right. Closeout.
short_description: Attractive styling and technical details make the women's ExOfficio Dryflylite Cap Sleeve Shirt a versatile choice for work, weekends and travel adventures to faraway lands.
